GSD.description:
block, bfq: don't move oom_bfqq

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 87fdfe8589d43e471dffb4c60f75eeb6f37afc4c. For more details please see the references link.
